examples: tasks of such repetitive and numbing dullness
a desert of unremitting flatness and dullness

noun.description: Lack of brightness, vividness, or sheen.
examples: flowery options to brighten up the dullness of autumn
the summer light cut into the dullness of the room

noun.description: The quality of being slow to understand; stupidity.
examples: critical comments on the stupidity or dullness of those in authority
